metadata.title: CVE-2023-27787 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue found in TCPprep v.4.4.3 allows a remote attacker to cause adenial of service via the parse_list function at the list.c:81 endpoint.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
